name: The Mountain Climber
description:
WASD to move. Use A and D to swing and press W to climb the hook! Press R to pause the game if you need to.

Start at the Tutorial level for the best experience! This game is a work in progress. I hope to add more levels and more features in the coming months. 

You are a mountain climber with one goal, to reach the top! Explore the caves of the mountain while overcoming puzzle and platforming challenges.

Everything you see in this game was done by me!

Enjoy! Feedback is always welcomed.
